title: 1.33 From Bandit to King
itunes:title: From Bandit to King
description: With the support of the Philistines, David turns his bandit gang into a disciplined mercenary force. After Saul's death fighting David's patrons in battle at Mt Gilboa, David is made king of the southern tribes, but not the northern.
content:encoded: With the support of the Philistines, David turns his bandit gang into a disciplined mercenary force. After Saul's death fighting David's patrons in battle at Mt Gilboa, David is made king of the southern tribes, but not the northern.
itunes:subtitle: Saul and his sons are killed by the Philistines. David moves to exploit the opportunity.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
